main.*:
[[File:Paulo's_Cat.jpg|thumb|right|250px|Paolo's Cat about to pounce on Ross]]

'''Paolo's cat''' is the cat that is only seen in "[[The One With The Blackout]]". While [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] and [[Ross Geller|Ross]] are standing on the balcony, the cat jumps Ross' shoulders, who panics and flails about, causing the cat to dig its claws deeper into his shoulder to desperately hold on as Ross tries to throw it off. Rachel tries to find the cat once it runs off and she finds the owner, [[Paolo]] who later dates her briefly.
